Name: Storm in a Teacup
About the game: Take Storm on a wonderful adventure in his magical teacup. Storm's brother Cloud has created an amazing dream-like world for you to explore! Solve puzzles, avoid pitfalls and beat the bad guys in this imaginative and unique platformer! Key Features: Wonderful, rich rewarding game-play with physics based puzzles Explore and discover 50 magical levels 5 Survival mode levels to compete against Customize in-game Storm character options Rich, gorgeous, graphics Full Joypad support
